alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 4:54PM AKST until January 04 at 1:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM WEDNESDAY TO 1 AM AKST THURSDAY FOR THOMPSON PASS... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Reduced visibility down to half a mile at times. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Thompson Pass. * WHEN...From 9 AM Wednesday to 1 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall begins Wednesday morning with winds increasing through Wednesday afternoon from the east. The worst conditions are expected Wednesday night 9 PM through midnight. Winds will decrease early Thursday morning with lingering snow showers through Thursday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
